article_metadata.description: Ben Carson announced Monday that he is running for president. The renowned doctor's direct talk has made him a rising star in the GOP's conservative wing, while also causing him political trouble.

og.description: Ben Carson announced Monday that he is running for president. The renowned doctor's direct talk has made him a rising star in the GOP's conservative wing, while also causing him political trouble. Photo: AP
og.title: Ben Carson’s Rapid Rise
